lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You are doing some clothes shopping. A gorgeous guy keeps looking over at you, whispering to his friend and smiling.
He walks over to you, swaggering slightly, and introduces himself.
He eyes you up and down, stopping at all the strategic points along the way.
He notes that you are a sharp dresser.

He mentions that he needs to buy a present for someone just about your size and wonders whether you would consider trying on a beautiful and expensive formal gown, so he can make a decision. He has a slight accent.
You try on the gown. He probably has a girlfriend.
He certainly does. Thanks for the help.
No, he doesn't -- only a big fat wallet and a new dress and dinner invitation just for you.
